name: yelp_bulk_search
description: Search multiple business types on Yelp in parallel using concurrent browser tabs. Use this instead of calling yelp_search multiple times.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: Location for all searches (e.g. 'San Francisco, CA')

steps.code: return `{{queries}}`.split(',').map(q => ({ url: 'https://www.yelp.com/search?find_desc=' + encodeURIComponent(q.trim()) + '&find_loc=' + encodeURIComponent(`{{location}}`), query: q.trim() }))
steps.name: items
steps.label: Build search URL list

detailSteps.code: const results = []; const cards = document.querySelectorAll('[data-testid="serp-ia-card"], [class*="container"][class*="hoverable"]'); for (let i = 0; i < Math.min(cards.length, 5); i++) { const el = cards[i]; const nameEl = el.querySelector('[class*="businessName"] a, a[href*="/biz/"]'); const ratingEl = el.querySelector('[class*="star"][aria-label], [role="img"][aria-label]'); const reviewCountEl = el.querySelector('[class*="reviewCount"]'); const priceEl = el.querySelector('[class*="priceRange"]'); results.push({ name: nameEl ? nameEl.textContent.trim() : '', rating: ratingEl ? (ratingEl.getAttribute('aria-label') || '') : '', review_count: reviewCountEl ? reviewCountEl.textContent.trim() : '', price_range: priceEl ? priceEl.textContent.trim() : '', url: nameEl ? nameEl.href : '' }); } const params = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search); return { query: params.get('find_desc') || '', result_count: results.length, results: results }
detailSteps.name: search_results
detailSteps.label: Extract results
